text.tspan: Cumulative lives saved by measles vaccination since 1974
Estimated cumulative number of lives saved by measles vaccination since 1974.
Data source: Shattock et al. (2024). Contribution of vaccination to improved survival and health: modelling 50 years of the Expanded
